name: Kitchen Khaos
description:
Download for the cutscene :D

Your restaurant has been cursed! One of the waiters made a witch very angry and now it's your job to clean all the dishes, silverware and whatnot; problem is, they've grown legs, arms and other limbs that make your job way more difficult. Finish your job by the end of the shift or the kitchen won't be the only thing being fired...

Credits: 

Programmers:  Asfand and David

Artist: Saad Kebach   3D Artist: Ilyas

Musician: Fonix
